messages.title: Standing Up for Real Change
messages.content: Like many UKIP candidates I have had a long working life outside politics. Career politicians of successive Labour and Conservative governments have promised so much but delivered so little other than a colossal Â£1.5 TRILLION national debt and uncontrolled immigration which is swamping schools, housing stock, the NHS and all other public services.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Only UKIP will free the UK from the crippling cost of EU membership, control immigration and rebuild prosperity by investing in Britain.
Control uncontrolled immigration which is swamping schools, housing stock, the NHS and all other public services.
